name: Aristoi
storyline: The aristocrat people of Ancient Greek meet in the game. They are the most powerful people in Ancient Greek. Warrior, Philosopher, Healer, Sorcerer et al. Some of them using their power for their benefits, some of them try to use it for equality and justice. It affects the lives of the villagers. 2 different teams and 9 unique roles.
summary: Aristoi is a social-deduction & role-play game. There are 9 different roles with two different teams. Players use their roles, voting suspicious to win. Players using communitication skills to convince others.
